content: The fear in the pit of my stomach is back. I’m not sure what stage of grief I’m at since the election of tv reality star with a limited vocabulary and understanding,and lack of desire to learn the job. I’m still incredulous that so many were willing to vote for a man that said more than once, “ We have nukes so why don’t we use them?” I was hoping that Congress would decide it now time to remove the “football”from being in the power of just one man. Trump has already repeatedly shown his hasn’t the temperament, judgment or the intelligence to weigh the consequences of his actions. He brags about shooting from the hip and keep them guessing. Trump needs to be removed before he gets us past the point of no return. Climate change will not a concern as much as a nuclear winter.
